level.text: An electricity supplier may use accumulated renewable energy credits to meet the renewable energy portfolio standard by submitting them to the Commission as evidence of compliance.
A renewable energy credit may be sold or otherwise transferred.
Except as authorized under section (d) of this section, a renewable energy credit shall exist for 3 years from the date created.
A renewable energy credit may be diminished or extinguished before the expiration of 3 years by:
The electricity supplier that received the credit;
A nonaffiliated entity of the electricity supplier:
That purchased the credit from the electricity supplier receiving the credit;
To whom the electricity supplier otherwise transferred the credit; or
Demonstrated compliance by the generating facility with the requirements of ยง 34-1433(i).
